name: 200416-mern-intro-lecture-house472
description: ### File Structure + Set Up - Create a directory called `server` - this is where our server will be  - Create a react app called `client` - this is where our react app will be - Create an express server with a create endpoint and read all endpoint mounted to an `api` path - Test endpoints - In the react app create a class based `AppContainer` component and render the text `Simple MERN Application` - Run React App to view in browser
